translations: 无法满足的，贪得无厌的

sentences.sentence: Since technology has such an insatiable appetite for eating up human jobs, this phenomenon will continue to restructure our economy in ways we cannot immediately foresee.
sentences.translation: 由于技术在吞噬人类工作方面非常“贪得无厌”，所以这一现象将会继续以短时间难以预料的方式重构我们的经济。

sentences.sentence: The public have an insatiable appetite for scandal.
sentences.translation: 公众对丑事总是喜闻乐道。

sentences.sentence: There seems to be an insatiable demand for more powerful computers.
sentences.translation: 人们对于加强计算机功能的要求似乎永无止境。
